title: Dissonant Whispers
content:
1 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Dissonant Whispers Information

Description: Whisper a discordant melody to a creature and Frighten it. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Wisdom
